rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious entry area with a reception counter and coat check area that aligns well with Vastu principles by offering a welcoming yet secure environment.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen. The design incorporates natural light from east and south windows to enhance energy flow in compliance with Vastu.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern, open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area. The kitchen design features island counters and efficient cabinetry with a west-facing window for optimal light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom featuring built-in wardrobes and an en-suite bathroom. Placed in the southwest quadrant for balanced energy.

rooms.name: Additional Bedrooms
rooms.description: Three additional bedrooms designed with minimalistic interior finishes. Each room is well ventilated and receives natural light from the north or east.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater room with acoustic treatment and controlled lighting. Positioned in the southeast to minimize distractions.

rooms.name: Study/Workspace
rooms.description: A functional study area with built-in shelves and a desk. Placed near the living room for easy access.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom with adjoining bathroom ensuring privacy. Located on the north side for positive energy and ease of access.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A family bathroom designed with natural lighting from the east and functional fixtures.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large glass door with secure access at the north-east corner to maximize auspicious entry.

openings.name: Balcony/Veranda
openings.description: Open balcony adjoining the living room, providing natural ventilation and connection with outdoors.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: A separate door for service personnel located at the south-west corner ensuring efficient utility access while maintaining privacy.
